name: Nombre del equipo: Experiencia de la Comuna 13
name_original: Nombre del equipo: Experiencia de la Comuna 13
description:
Have you ever wanted to know a place from the eyes of who inhabits it?

In Graffiti we have found a way to tell our stories to others.

Commune 13 was known for being one of the most dangerous places in the world, and through Art and Culture a social change was generated, becoming a benchmark for Peace and transformation worldwide.

A tourist route called Graffiti Tour was created, which is adorned with works of art that dress the neighborhood.

Our goal is to give dynamism to existing Art and support its narrative intent. Mixing the most touristic site in the city with the Metaverse.

Through Niantic Lightship tools such as RemoteAuthoring and VPS, visitors can locate the works displayed on the tour and see them come to life, allowing us to connect with the history and art that artists and the inhabitants of their community want to communicate.

Provide a technological resource that enhances the experience of the 720,000 visitors received annually by this community based on social transformation and art.
